description.en: Two years after the end of Bloody Monday, a new threat emerges intent on destroying Japan. But what will happen now that "Falcon" has since disappeared? Who will face the deadly "Shooter of the Magic Bullet?" Tune in to Bloody Monday Second Season and find out!

A master elementalist, Egret lived his entire life in the company of elemental spirits, having felt shunned by human society for his immense power. After his death, he is reborn as the young prince Judas, a social outcast bullied for his quietness and small frame. With his trusty spirits by his side, Egret enters the elite academy Ruvar-H, where he must make friends and turn Judas’ reputation around. But with danger from his past life following him, can this great sage make it in the real world?

description.ja:
四大属性をすべて治める偉大な大賢者イグレット。死を目前にした瞬間、彼は悟った。 天涯孤独で精霊たちとだけ共にした人生。 「……私は何のために生きてきたのか」 あまりにも強大な力を持つゆえ、多くを諦めざるを得ず、死を前にして心残りを感じていた…。 しかし、死の果てから帝国の皇子ジューダス·ルバルザン·アルカディオンの体で目覚めることに！？ 虚弱な皇子として蘇った大賢者の成長ファンタジー！

Эрет, великий мудрец, управляющий всеми четырьмя атрибутами!
в тот момент, когда смерть предстала перед его глазами, он задумался...
…А для чего я жил?!
Мне пришлось отказаться от вещей в которых я был так хорош...

description.de:
Als sich vor zehn Jahren das „Gate“ öffnete und unsere Welt sich mit der von Monstern verband, erhielten einige normale Menschen die Macht, diese Monster zu jagen. Sie sind als die „Hunter“ bekannt. Doch nicht alle Hunter sind mächtig. Mein Name ist Jin-Woo Sung, ich bin ein Hunter mit Rang E. Ich bin ein Hunter, der selbst in den einfachsten Dungeons sein Leben riskieren muss, der „weltschwächste“. Da ich keine einzige, hervorstechende Fähigkeit habe, schaffte ich es kaum, das nötige Geld für den Zutritt zu den schwächsten Dungeons zu verdienen … jedenfalls, bis ich in einem Rang D Dungeon einen versteckten Dungeon mit der höchstmöglichen Schwierigkeit fand! Als ich dort letztendlich meinen Tod akzeptiert hatte, erhielt ich eine seltsame Macht, einen Questlog, den nur ich sehen konnte, ein Geheimnis, mit dem ich mein Level steigern konnte! Wenn ich die Quests erfülle und basierend auf den gestellten Aufgaben trainiere und Monster jage, steigt mein Level. Ich werde vom weltschwächsten Hunter zum stärksten Rang S Hunter! 


- [Book <German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)

- [<German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)
description.en:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

---

Lorsque d’étranges portails sont apparus aux quatre coins du monde, l’humanité a dû trouver parade pour ne pas finir massacrée entre les griffes des monstres qu’ils ont apportés avec eux. La solution ? Les chasseurs ! Ces combattants intrépides n’hésitent pas à foncer au cœur des donjons dimensionnels pour combattre les créatures qu’ils abritent, et y collecter des trésors.

description.id:
Dunia diserang monster! Muncullah "hunter" untuk menyerang monster-monster itu. Di kalangan hunter, ada yang disebut hunter terlemah di dunia. Itulah julukan Seong Jinwoo. Masuk rumah sakit adalah kebiasaannya setelah masuk ke dungeon. Suatu hari, saat melakukan raid, suatu peristiwa tragis menimpanya. Peristiwa itu hampir merenggut nyawanya. Namun, saat tersadar, dia mendapati dirinya masih hidup dan melihat sesuatu yang tidak bisa dilihat orang lain. Sejak saat itu, kehidupan Seong Jinwoo berubah. Inilah perjalanan Seong Jinwoo untuk menjadi hunter terkuat di dunia!

description.it:
10 anni fa, dopo l'apertura di “Portali” che connettono il mondo reale con quello dei mostri, gente comune ha ricevuto il potere di cacciare i mostri all'interno dei Portali. Sono conosciuti come "Hunter". Tuttavia, non tutti gli Hunter sono potenti. Il mio nome è Sung Jin-Woo, un Hunter di grado E, il "più debole al mondo". Senza particolari abilità a mia disposizione, guadagno la mia paga combattendo in dungeon di basso livello… Almeno finché non ho trovato un dungeon della massima difficoltà nascosto in un dungeon di grado D! Alla fine, mentre mi accingevo ad accettare la morte, ho ricevuto uno strano potere, un'interfaccia per le missioni che solo io posso vedere, un segreto per aumentare di livello di cui solo io sono a conoscenza! La trasformazione dal più debole al più forte Hunter di grado S!

description.ja:
十数年前、異次元と現世界を結ぶ通路”ゲート”というものが現れてからハンターと呼ばれる覚醒者たちが出現した。 ハンターはゲート内のダンジョンに潜むモンスターを倒し対価を得る人たちだ。しかし全てのハンターが強者とは限らない。 人類最弱兵器と呼ばれるE級ハンター「水篠　旬」 母親の病院代を稼ぐため嫌々ながらハンターを続けている。 ある日、D級ダンジョンに隠された高難易度の二重ダンジョンに遭遇した「旬」は死の直前に特別な能力を授かる。 「旬」にだけ見えるデイリークエストウィンドウ…！？ 「旬」ひとりだけが知ってるレベルアップの秘密… 毎日届くクエストをクリアし、モンスターを倒せばレベルアップする…！？ 果たして「旬」ひとりのレベルアップはどこまで続くのかーー！！

description.ka: E-კლასის მონადირე ჯინვუ სუნგი ყველაზე სუსტია. ყველა ზემოდან უყურებს, მას არც ფული აქვს, არც სხვა სამუშაო პერსპექტივა. ასე რომ, როდესაც მისი პარტია იპოვის დამალულ დუნგეონს, ის გადაწყვეტს გამოიყენოს ეს შანსი თავისი ცხოვრების უკეთესობისკენ შესაცვლელად… მაგრამ ის შესაძლებლობა, რომელსაც ის აღმოაჩენს, ოდნავ განსხვავდება იმისგან, რაც მას ჰქონდა მხედველობაში…
description.ko:
10여 년 전, 
다른 차원과 이쪽 세계를 이어 주는 통로 ‘게이트’가 열리고 
평범한 이들 중 각성한 자들이 생겨났다.

게이트 안의 던전에서 마물을 사냥하는 각성자.
그들을 일컬어 ‘헌터’라 부른다.

그러나 모든 헌터가 강한 것은 아니다.

내 이름은 성진우.
E급 헌터다. 

저급 던전에서조차 죽을 고비를 넘겨야 하는
‘인류 최약병기’. 

무엇 하나 내세울 것 없는 형편에
저급 던전으로 근근이 생계를 이어가던 그는,
D급 던전 속에 숨겨진 
최악의 난이도의 이중 던전을 만난다.

그리고 결국… 죽음을 맞이하려던 순간,
그는 기이한 능력을 얻게 된다. 

오직 그에게만 보이는 게임 퀘스트 창!
오직 그만이 알게 된 레벨 업의 비밀!

퀘스트를 따라 수련하고
몬스터를 사냥하면 레벨이 오른다.
오직 그 혼자만! 


최약체 헌터에서 최강 헌터로 각성하다!

추공 작가의 인기 판무 소설 <나 혼자만 레벨업>이
웹툰으로 드디어 등장!

description.pl:
Dziesięć lat temu otworzyły się wrota łączące inne światy z naszym. Krótko po tym pojawili się Łowcy, osoby dysponujące mocą by móc walczyć wewnątrz wrót. Historia nasza skupia się na Sung Jin-woo, który jest łowcą rangi-E, nazywanym najsłabszym łowcą. Po incydencie z podwójnym lochem będąc bliskim śmierci zyskuje on nadludzką siłę i jako jedyny może zdobywać doświadczenie by stać się silniejszym. Od najsłabszego do najsilniejszego.

description.ru:
10 лет назад, после того, как открылись «Врата», соединившие реальный мир с параллельным, некоторые из людей получили силу охотиться на монстров внутри «Врат». Они известны как «Охотники». Однако не все Охотники сильные. Меня зовут Сун Джин-Ву, охотник E-ранга. Я тот, кто рискует своей жизнью в самых низких уровнях подземелья. Не имея никаких сверхсильных навыков, я едва зарабатывал необходимые деньги, сражаясь в низкоуровневых подземельях... по крайней мере, пока я не нашел скрытое подземелье с самыми трудными проблемами в подземельях D-ранга! В конце концов, когда я чуть не умер, я внезапно получил странную силу, журнал квестов, который мог видеть только я, секрет для поднятия уровня, о котором знаю только я! Если я тренировался в соответствии с моими квестами и охотился на монстров, то мой уровень повышался. Переход от самого слабого Охотника к самому сильному, Охотнику S-ранга!

description.th:
10 ปีก่อน 'เกต' ที่พาทะลุสู่อีกมิติหนึ่งได้เปิดขึ้น ภายในเกตมีมอนสเตอร์ตัวร้ายที่เหล่าผู้คนที่ถูกปลุกพลังจะต้องกำราบ 
คนเหล่านั้นได้รับการขนานนามว่า 'ฮันเตอร์' แต่ทว่า ไม่ใช่ฮันเตอร์ทุกคนที่จะแข็งแกร่ง
ซองจินอู ผู้ได้รับฉายาว่าเป็นอาวุธที่กากที่สุดในมวลมนุษยชาติ คือฮันเตอร์แรงค์ E ที่แม้กระทั่งในดันเจี้ยนแรงค์ต่ำๆ ชีวิตเขาก็ยังแขวนบนเส้นด้าย
แต่หลังจากที่ได้เข้าไปในดับเบิลดันเจี้ยนและรอดชีวิตกลับมา เขาก็เปลี่ยนไป
จากฮันเตอร์ที่กากที่สุด เขาจะกลายเป็นผู้ที่แกร่งที่สุด!

description.es-la: Sung Jinwoo es un cazador de rango E, considerado como el nivel más bajo dentro de la Asociación de cazadores, por lo que se le conoce como “El cazador más débil”. Día tras día pone en peligro su vida y se embarca en misiones del rango más bajo para poder sufragar los gastos de su madre enferma; sin embargo, en una de esas misiones, lo que en un principio parecía un raid de rango D termina por ser una mazmorra de un nivel inusitado y las cosas empiezan a torcerse… ¿Lograrán Sung y sus compañeros salir con vida?
description.pt-br:
Dez anos atrás, depois do "Portal" que conecta o mundo real com um mundo de montros se abriu, algumas pessoas comuns receberam o poder de caçar os monstros do portal. Eles são conhecidos como caçadores. Porém, nem todos os caçadores são fortes. Meu nome é Sung Jin-Woo, um caçador de rank E. Eu sou alguém que tem que arriscar a própria vida nas dungeons mais fracas, "O mais fraco do mundo". Sem ter nenhuma habilidade à disposição, eu mal consigo dinheiro nas dungeons de baixo nível… Ao menos até eu encontrar uma dungeon escondida com a maior dificuldade dentro do Rank D! No fim, enquanto aceitava minha morte, eu ganhei um novo poder…

description.zh-hk:
十幾年前，世界上出現了
連接異次元與這個世界的通道「傳送門」， 
而人群中還出現了覺醒之人。 

在傳送門裡狩獵魔物的覺醒者們，
又被稱為「獵人」。

然而並不是所有獵人都很強。

我叫成振宇， 
是個E級獵人。

我是連在低級地下城裡都得拼命 
才能死裡逃生的「人類最弱兵器」。

altTitles.es-la: La canción de la larga marcha

description.en:
Chang An in the Tang Dynasty of China (618–907): The demon star is passing through the sky, calamity is about to befall the Tang Dynasty.  
  
Princess Yongning is forced to flee the castle after her family is killed. Because she is young, she is able to pass for a boy and becomes renowned as a great military strategist. On her journey, she makes trusted allies with her skills as well as fearsome enemies while aiming to protect the Tang Dynasty and exact revenge.  
  
  
On hiatus or potentially discontinued after chapter 61 due to an ongoing conflict between the author and publisher.  
  
 [Official Vietnamese Translation](https://bookbuy.vn/truyen-tranh/truong-ca-hanh-tap-1-p39909.html)

title.en: Starting as a Master of Female Disciples' Leisure Skills

description.en: Xiu Xian died and, upon waking up, found himself transmigrated into the body of a cowardly illegitimate son from a cultivation family. Without spiritual roots, he couldn’t cultivate, and the head of the family despised him. Almost anyone in the household could easily humiliate him. However, he acquired a "Female Disciples' Leisure System." As long as his female disciples cultivated various leisure skills like cooking, painting, blacksmithing, weaving, and construction, Xiu Xian would gain experience points. As the disciples improved their skills, they could even develop all sorts of incredible cultivation techniques—like eating food to restore health bars...

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.en:
In order to kill the dictator, an assassin wore female clothing and snuck into the palace. He didn't expect to be caught immediately that night. But the dictator did not kill him. Instead, he asked to sleep with the assassin and treated him like a sleeping pill.   
After staying in the palace for a while, the assassin discovered a deep conspiracy, and the dictator didn't seem that bad after all. Meanwhile, he even started to feel a little sympathetic…

Eno Kawai is a bright, kind and mischievous high school girl. 
Yuzuki Akehana is a quiet and earnest beauty.

The two started dating due to various reasons, and as they go about their daily lives, the girls grow closer as they navigate the path of love.
description.ja:
明るく優しいイタズラ好きな女子高生。可愛（えの）

無口で一途な童顔の美女。愉月（ゆづき）

二人は"色々あって“付き合うこととなり、日常の中で愛し合い恋の路を歩んでいく…　（一話完結の百合漫画）

title.en: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou desu ga, Pan wo Yaitara Seijo ni Job Change Shimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢ですが、パンを焼いたら聖女にジョブチェンジしました!?

description.en: Even spirits are enthralled by Tia's homemade bread! After being reincarnated into the world of a girls' game and finishing her punishment as the villainous lady, all that's left is to live freely!! Having exited the public eye as planned, Avaritia has taken up bread-making, a hobby of her previous life, and is working hard to spread its deliciousness to the people of the other world, who have only ever known hard, difficult-to-eat bread.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Suterareta ga, Hirowarete Tanoshiku Ikiteimasu

altTitles.ja: 転生したら捨てられたが、拾われて楽しく生きています。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shitara Suterareta ga, Hirowarete Tanoshiku Ikiteimasu

altTitles.en: When she was reincarnated, she was abandoned, but she was picked up and is living happily ever after.

description.en: Millie is reincarnated as a baby with memories of her previous life.However, at the age of five months, she is abandoned in the cold...! She was picked up by Joe and Marissa who happened to be passing by, and her life was saved, but the life of the common people in another world that awaits her is quite severe.... She finds herself in a dirty room full of dust and stains, without the delicious food she had in her previous life! The couple's restaurant and inn, "Cat's Pavilion in the Shade of the Trees," is in financial trouble! In order to return the favor she was given, she changes the store with her cheat magic and knowledge from her previous life...the long-awaited comic book version of the popular web novel!

An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en:
Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place!

Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t?

A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

description.en:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

title.en: Neko oji: Salaryman reincarnated as a kitten!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en:
An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000231_S?episodeType=first)

**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/neko-oji-salaryman-reincarnated-as-a-kitten/volumes)

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

altTitles.fr: Le garçon qui l'intéressait n'en était en fait pas un

altTitles.pt-br: O cara de que estou a fim não era um cara?!

altTitles.uk: Хлопець, який її цікавив, взагалі не був хлопцем

altTitles.ru: Парень, которым она увлечена, на самом деле не парень

altTitles.az: Onun maraqlandığı oğlan əslində heç oğlan deyilmiş

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zàiyì de rén bùshì yìxìng

altTitles.id: Pria Yang Dia Suka Ternyata Sama Sekali Bukan Pria

altTitles.th: คนที่เธอปิ๊งความจริงไม่ใช่ผู้ชาย

altTitles.ja-ro: Kininatteru Hito ga Otoko ja Nakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Dogs and the Brave Are Not Showy

altTitles.en: Dogs and Heroes Don't Dress Up

description.en: Summoned to another world to defeat the demon king, Satou Sousuke, 18 years old and only finished elementary school, is brought back to his world after several years had passed. While unable to find employment anywhere and living off a part-time job, Sousuke encounters a battle between a magician and a demon he thought didn’t exist on earth! He easily defeated the demon, so being marked for his power he’s involved in Demon subjugation?!

altTitles.ja: スパイダーマン／偽りの赤
スパイダーマン フェイクレッド

description.en: High school outcast and Spider-Man fan Yuu leads a life of unfulfilled expectations. But after finding the legendary webslinger's suit in an alley, his life makes a big change! What could be lying in store for this aspiring young lad!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

altTitles.vi: Cách thức trở thành gia đình

description.en: Do-yeon and Eun-ha, who became a family due to their parents' remarriage, become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon, and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム バトルオペレーション コード・フェアリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

description.en: The "Noisy Fairy Squadron, a secret unit under the direct control of Kycilia Zabi of the Principality of Zeon, is deployed somewhere in the North American continent. With only female members, they fight in the One Year War against the Earth Federation Forces. They are forced to face the unreasonableness of war and the bonds with their comrades...

title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

altTitles.en: My First Girlfriend is a Gal

altTitles.pt-br: Minha primeira namorada é uma Gal!

altTitles.vi: Cô Bạn Gái Của Tôi Là Một Gyaru

description.en: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
description.ja: DT(童貞)を捨てたいと悩む高校生・羽柴ジュンイチ。ある日、「ギャルに土下座で頼めば卒業できる」という迷信を聞いて、ダメ元でクラスのギャル・八女に土下座で告白した所…まさかの大成功!? 見事付き合うことになるのだが、ビッチなのに身持ちは固い八女さんに、非リアな羽柴は弄ばれる毎日で…。果たして羽柴は「はじめて」から卒業できるのか!?
description.vi: Mùa xuân, mùa của tình yêu đã đến và có vẻ như việc tìm ra bạn gái của anh ấy khó hơn với Junichi. Để tìm ra cách, bạn của Junichi buộc anh phải thú nhận với cô gái, Yame Yukana. Tuy nhiên, mọi việc không diễn ra như anh mong đợi. và cái gì tới nó tới
description.pt-br: Junichi Hashiba é um jovem colegial virgem que está desesperado para perder esse status. Sob pressão de seus amigos, o garoto acaba se declarando para Yukana Yame. Surpreendentemente a garota aceita  e um casal é formado. Porém, Jun acaba se encontrando em águas desconhecidas com Yame, que é uma gyaru (um tipo de moda urbana japonesa). Enquanto ele fantasia em perder a sua virgindade, ela se mostra mais normal e inocente do que ele imaginava.

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love is a Failure.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en:
Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire.

Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach.

And there was a “fate” that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja:
ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。

彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。

そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。

2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return

altTitles.es-la: Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas do Retorno do Deus Marcial

description.en:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
description.fr: Le sixième chef-d’œuvre du genre Wuxia qui comblera vos attentes, tout comme les [Chroniques du retour du troisième degré], [La conquête de la faction céleste] et les [Chroniques des sept dragons et des sept démons]. [Chroniques du retour du Dieu Martial] Le Démon Martial Divin Ultime, Dan Woohyun, a été enfermé car il était trop fort pour que le monde puisse le gérer. Après un millénaire, il a été libéré de son sceau et avait l’impression que tout n’avait pas de sens alors qu’il errait dans les ruelles… Au moment où il s’est écroulé parce qu’il en avait marre du monde, une petite main est apparue devant lui. « Qu’est-ce que c’est ? » a demandé Dan Woohyun. « Une boulette ! » lui a été répondu. C’était la première fois de sa vie que quelqu’un était gentil avec lui sans aucune intention impure, et cela a changé son destin. Voici les chroniques d’un dieu martial qui a traversé mille ans de temps et d’espace !
description.ko:
그 누구도 맞설 수 없는 최흉의 인재(人災),

무극신마, 단우현.

이대로 영원히 세상위에 군림할 줄 알았다.
중원의 질서를 지키는 팔선들에 의해 동정호에 봉인을 당하기 전까지는….

세월이 흘러 천 년 후.
천 년이라는 시간은 단우현에게서 살심을 없애기에 충분했다.
변해버린 세상, 아는 사람이라고는 아무도 없는 고독, 남은 것은 허탈함과 공허함 뿐.

“바람이 흐르듯 세월도 흐르는구나. 정말로 아무것도 남은 것이 없어.”

목적도, 삶의 의지도 잃고 정처없이 떠도는 단우현 앞에 나타난 자그마한 소녀. 화소미.
누구에게도 기댈 곳 없어 보이는 소녀에게 단우현은 동질감을 느끼며 점점 마음의 문을 열기 시작한다.

“나는 단우현이다. 나와 함께 가자꾸나.”

얼음장 같은 마음을 가진 무신과 귀엽고 순수한 소녀의
마음을 따뜻하게 녹여 줄 평범하지 않은 한 가족의 중원 생활 이야기.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYB8b4SxrLo)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891)
description.zh: 因嗜杀被封印千年的武神苏醒归来，这一世，他却只想安安静静的养女儿...
description.pt-br: Dono de um talento inigualável, Dan Woohyeon. Ele pensou que governaria o mundo eternamente, até que foi selado. Milhares de anos se passaram. O mundo mudou e as únicas coisas que restaram foram o desespero e o vazio. “À medida que o vento flui, o tempo também. Realmente não há mais nada.” Uma garotinha aparece na frente de Dan Woohyeon, que não perdeu o propósito nem a vontade de viver.  Dan Woohyeon sente-se unido com uma garota que parece não ter ninguém em quem se apoiar e gradualmente começa a abrir as portas do seu coração. “Meu nome é Dan Woohyeon. Quer vir comigo?” Começa a jornada de um deus marcial com um coração gelado e uma garota fofa e pura.

description.en: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
description.ja:
女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

description.en:
"Onii-tama?"
Cain, who reincarnated as one of the love interests of an otome game, screamed at the loveliness of his sister, Diana. I can't believe that this angel is going to be a villainess with countless bad ends-- No, there is no way that such a future can exist! Clenching his fist tightly, he raises his sister into a gentle lady, while also dispelling the darkness held by the love interests in place of the heroine. Relying on his game knowledge from his previous life and an orphaned chamberlain. Everything for his beloved sister--
description.id:
"Abwang?"

Cain, orang yang baru saja bereinkarnasi menjadi salah satu target kencan di sebuah otome game, tiba-tiba berteriak karena melihat keimutan adik perempuannya, Diana.
Aku tidak menyangka kalau malaikat kecil ini akan menjadi seorang villainess dengan akhir yang tragis-- Tidak, aku tidak akan membiarkan masa depan seperti itu terjadi!
Dengan mengepalkan tangannya, dia bertekat untuk membesarkan adik perempuannya menjadi seorang wanita yang baik hati dan tidak sombong, sembari menghilangkan segala masa lalu yang buruk dari para target kencan lain menggantikan sang tokoh utama.
Bergantung pada pengetahuannya tentang gamenya di kehidupan yang dulu dan juga pengalamannya sebagai anak yatim piastu, semuanya dilakukan demi adik perempuannya-- dan akhirnya, tantangan bagi sang kakak akan dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: ゲーム実況中に過労死し、乙女ゲームのキャラ・カインに転生した俺は、妹・ディア―ナの圧倒的可愛さに心を奪われた。しかし、このままゲーム世界が進んでいけば、妹は辺境の地で凌辱されたり、暗殺者に殺される壮絶なバットエンドを迎えると決まっていた。「この世界で妹を幸せにする!!」そう誓った俺は妹を淑女に育てながら、ゲームのシナリオに逆らっていく。そう、すべては愛する妹のため……。「おにーたま、ディ、にんじんもたべたのです!」「えらい! ディアーナは何て素晴らしいんだ!!!」

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.th: ร้อยเรียงรักจากหัวใจ

description.de: Als die gehörlose Studentin Yuki eines Tages in Schwierigkeiten gerät, kommt ihr ihr Kommilitone Itsuomi zu Hilfe. Yuki ist fasziniert von Itsuomi, da er sie trotz ihres Handicaps wie einen ganz normalen Menschen behandelt. Durch ihn beginnt Yuki nicht nur eine neue Welt zu entdecken, sondern bekommt auch zum ersten Mal Herzklopfen.
description.en:
One day, Yuki, a university student, is in trouble when she is rescued by Itsuomi, a senior student at the same university. Even though Yuki is deaf due to a hearing impairment, Itsuomi is unfazed and treats her naturally. Yuki gradually becomes aware of Itsuomi, who makes her feel a new world...

---
Yuki is a typical college student, whose world revolves around her friends, social media, and the latest sales. But when a chance encounter on a train leads to her meeting friend-of-a-friend and fellow student Itsuomi-san, her world starts to widen. But even though Itsuomi-kun can speak three languages, sign language isn't one of them. Can the two learn to communicate the budding feelings between them?
description.es: La vida de Yuki, una universitaria con sordera, va a dar un vuelco cuando en su camino se cruce el joven Itsuomi, un muchacho que, a pesar de dominar varios idiomas, no conoce la lengua de signos japonesa. Itsuomi se interesa enseguida en Yuki y desea aprender la lengua de signos y, sobre todo, entrar en el mundo de ella. Signos de afecto es una historia de amor sobre la necesidad de la comunicación, sobre el aprendizaje de las diferencias y sobre la empatía.
description.fr:
Yuki est une étudiante qui, comme beaucoup d'autres, construit son quotidien autour de ses amis, des réseaux sociaux et de ce qu'elle aime. Mais quand un jour, dans le train, elle croise un jeune homme qui voyage à travers le monde, son univers va être chamboulé: ce dernier, bien que trilingue, ne connaît pas la langue des signes. Pourtant, très vite, il manifestera pour elle un intérêt bien particulier… Comment réagira-t-elle face à ce camarade d'université entreprenant et communicatif?

A sign of affection décrit avec pudeur et simplicité l'histoire d'amour entre une jeune femme sourde et un grand voyageur. à n'en pas douter, les personnages de ce manga ne manqueront pas de vous émouvoir!
description.it: Un giorno, in un momento di difficoltà, una studentessa universitaria di nome Yuki viene aiutata da Itsuomi, un senpai che frequenta il suo stesso istituto. Il giovane la tratta con grande naturalezza e non si scompone minimamente quando capisce che la ragazza è sorda. Ben presto, Yuki scoprirà di provare qualcosa per quel ragazzo, grazie al quale ha cominciato a percepire la realtà in maniera del tutto nuova...
description.ja: 女子大生の雪は、ある日困っているところを同じ大学の先輩・逸臣に助けてもらう。聴覚障がいがあって耳が聴こえない雪にも動じることなく、自然に接してくれる逸臣。自分に新しい世界を感じさせてくれる逸臣のことを雪は次第に意識し始めて…！？
description.ko: 여대생 유키는 어느날 곤란에 처해있을 때 같은 대학 선배인 이츠오미의 도움을 받는다. 청각장애가 있어 귀가 들리지 않는 유키에게도 동요하지 않고 자연스럽게 대해주는 이츠오미. 자신에게 새로운 세계를 느끼게 해준 이츠오미를 유키는 점점 의식하기 시작하는데…?!
description.pt: Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda. Ela ama estar perto dos seus amigos, redes sociais e fazer compras. Certo dia, ela recebe ajuda de Itsuomi, um estudante da mesma universidade que ela, enquanto estava no metrô. A partir daí, nasce uma amizade entre eles que se torna cada vez mais especial. "Neste dia, Yuki sentiu o seu mundo mudar."
description.ru: Это нежная история о любви между глухонемой девушкой и парнем, говорящем на нескольких языках и облетевшем мир, как много они могут привнести и изменить в мирах друг друга? Ицуоми выручает Юки, оказывается, что они учатся в одном университете. Случайная встреча, заинтересованность, стремление, желание… Что же Юки постепенно осознает?..
description.th: วันหนึ่ง ขณะกำลังตกที่นั่งลำบาก ยูคิ นักศึกษาสาว ได้อิสึโอมิ รุ่นพี่นักศึกษามหา'ลัยเดียวกันช่วยไว้แม้ยูคิจะไม่ได้ยินเสียงเพราะมีความบกพร่องทางการได้ยินแต่อิสึมิก็ยังทำตัวปกติเป็นธรรมชาติกับเธออย่างใจเย็นจากนั้นยูคิก็เริ่มสนใจอิสึมิที่ช่วยตัวเองได้สัมผัสถึงโลกใบใหม่ขึ้นมา...!?
description.tr: Tüm dünyası arkadaşları, sosyal medyası ve çok satanları etrafında dönen Yuki, tipik bir üniversite öğrencisidir. Ancak bir trende, bir arkadaşının arkadaşı olan İtsuomi-san ile tanışma şansı olunca dünyası genişlemeye başlar. Fakat maalesef, her ne kadar İtsuomi-kun üç dil konuşabilse de, işaret dili onlardan biri değildir. İkisi, aralarındaki tomurcuklanan duyguları birbirine iletmeyi öğrenebilecek mi?
description.uk:
Юкі — студентка. Як і в багатьох інших ровесників, її повсякденне життя обертається навколо друзів, соцмереж, загалом усього, що їй подобається. Та якось вона випадково зустріла в потязі юнака, що любить подорожувати, і її світ перевернувся.

Іцуомі трилінгв, однак не знає японської мови жестів.

Проте незабаром він нею особливо зацікавиться… Як Юкі відреагує на цього впертого однокурсника, який прагне подружитися з нею? «A Sign of affection» лаконічно і просто описує історію кохання дівчини з порушенням слуху та завзятого мандрівника. Без сумніву, стосунки між героями цієї манґи неодмінно вас зворушать!
description.zh: 自從與你相遇之后，我的世界出現了改變的聲音。
description.pt-br:
Yuki é uma típica estudante universitária que nasceu surda, cujo mundo gira em torno de seus amigos, redes sociais e as últimas vendas. Mas quando um encontro casual em um trem a leva a conhecer o amigo de um amigo e colega estudante Itsuomi-san, seu mundo começa a se ampliar. Mas mesmo que Itsuomi-kun fale três línguas, a linguagem de sinais não é uma delas.  

Os dois podem aprender a comunicar os sentimentos que estão surgindo entre eles?

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

altTitles.ja: トリガーハッピーセッション

description.en: Chihiro is a high school student whose dream was becoming a basketball player, but it was cut short due to an injury. One night he gets caught by Ryuji, creator of the wall art which Chihiro and his friends were messing up in the park. At first, Chihiro was scared, but attracted to Ryuji's good looks and then somehow became his assistant.

altTitles.ja: アキレウス アルゴスの軍神

description.en: The war begins. The Achaean army, led by Agamemnon, struggles against the Trojan army, which boasts an iron fortress. Achilles and Hector, the prince of Troy, cross swords in the midst of the battle and become attracted to each other. Meanwhile, a tragedy befalls Patroclus, who adores Achilles... This is the conclusion of the first chapter of this turbulent mythological spectacle.
description.ja:
伝説の英雄アキレス戦乙女となって数多の戦場を駆け抜ける!!

開戦。鉄壁の城塞を誇るトロイア軍を前に、アガメムノン率いるアカイアの軍勢は苦戦を強いられる。戦の渦中で剣を交わせ、互いに惹かれ合ってゆくアキレスとトロイの王子ヘクトル。一方、アキレスを慕うパトロクロスにある悲劇が…。激動の神話スペクタクル序章完結編。

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.
